verses.verse: The <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H3789>written<s%> with a <S%H5842>pen<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and with the <S%H6856>point<s%> of a <S%H8068>diamond<s%>: it is <S%H2790>graven<s%> upon the <S%H3871>tablet<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of your <S%H4196>altars<s%>;
